cast.overview: Twenty-eight days after a killer virus was accidentally unleashed from a British research facility, a small group of London survivors are caught in a desperate struggle to protect themselves from the infected. Carried by animals and humans, the virus turns those it infects into homicidal maniacs -- and it's absolutely impossible to contain.
cast.title: 28 Days Later

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Luke Mably (born Thomas Luke Mably on 1 March 1976) is an English actor, best known for playing Scott Lucas in Sky One's Dream Team, Prince Edvard in The Prince and Me and 'White' in the 2009 thriller, Exam. He attended the Birmingham School of Speech and Drama.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Luke Mably , licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Luke Mably
